Chinese: 4月1日,有人在餐饮博客网站Table to Grave上发帖称,美国食品公司The Kellogg Co.计划推出一系列Pop Tart蛋糕味伏特加.消息让整个互联网都泛起了一丝甜意,但支持和反对的声音交相呼应.后来人们才知道,这篇帖子是个愚人节玩笑,但不能责备上当受骗的消费者,原因是作为沙皇和特工007的宠儿,伏特加在最近几年的转型简直能让童话故事中的糖果大亨威利•旺卡笑得合不拢嘴.下面我们就来介绍几种市场上较新(也较不寻常)的加香型伏特加.同时,请允许我们保持007那样的态度:吃惊,但不激动.
English: When food blog Table to Grave ran an April 1 item that The Kellogg Co. (K,Fortune 500) planned to launch a line of Pop Tart-flavored vodkas, the Internet lit up with tweets and commentary from detractors and proponents alike. Turns out the posting was an April Fool's joke, but one can't blame consumers for getting taken in: In recent years the spirit favored by czars and James Bond has undergone a makeover that would make Willy Wonka beam. Here's a look at some of the newer (and more unusual) flavored vodkas on the market. Consider us shaken, not stirred.
